settings.text: Estimated delivery time for the 132'' Cinematic screen: within 14 days after placing order
• AWOL Pays your sales tax. Taxes are built into AWOL Visions prices, saving you hundreds of dollars per order.

•Tax-Inclusive, Save Around $200 For You

•Better Price and Service in Buy With Prime
Lead time is 90 working days. Delivery is to the fist available dry area. Inside delivery and setup is not included.

settings.title: FREE SHIPPING
settings.dialog_context:
Shipping fee

USA excluded Alaska and Hawaii

For products like projectors, screens and accessories, it is free standard shipment and the delivery time is  3-4 business days after the order is processed.

For products like Smart cabinet and  Vanish Rollable Laser TV, the shipping fee is from $150-$500 depending on the size and the style. The delivery time is 90 days after the order is processed.

Other US states, territories, and other countries

For products like projectors, screens, and accessories, the shipping fee is as follows:

Australia: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Canada: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-10 business days.

EU & UK: $100 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Hong Kong & Macao SAR: Free standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 days.

View more >

settings.title: AWOL’S COMMITMENTS
settings.dialog_context:
Free Return within 30 days

Undamaged products may be returned for a full refund for any reason within 30 days of the delivery date. Once the returned item arrives back in Awol Vision’s warehouse 16 Technology Dr, Suite 133, Irvine, CA 92618 for inspection, the refund process will begin.

View more >

24 Month Hassle-Free Warranty

Elevation Technology Partners (AWOL Vision) warrants our products to be free from defects in workmanship and materials, under normal residential or commercial use and conditions, for a period as listed below.
Laser TV / Projectors/Screens: 1-year limited warranty & 1-year free extended warranty (total 2-year warranty)
Smart Cabinets: 5 years on the cabinet; 2 years on mechanical and electrical components
Accessories: 1-year limited warranty

60 Days Price Match Guarantee

AWOL guarantees that we will refund you the difference if you find a lower price from us within 30 days of your purchase.

Lifetime Customer Support

We are committed to providing lifelong customer service support, so if you need help, please contact us.

settings.image_alt_mobile: Stunning display of a 100 inch ultra short throw projector screen showcasing a cinematic sunset scene, perfect for UST projectors

settings.image_alt: LTV-3000 Pro 4K 3D Triple Laser Projector with high lumens for vibrant clarity in a stylish design.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Display AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro has couple of features, illustrating LTV-3000 Pro as the best ALL-Around 4k 3d laser projector.
settings.context:
The Most Adaptable 4K 3D
RGB Laser Projector

settings.image_alt: Graphically showing the AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro glass lens performance, offering users the best viewing experience.
settings.image_alt_mobile: It explicitly shows the AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro glass lens properties, offering the best viewing experience.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro offers users the best view sharpness of every single upper corner, even the screen expands to 150 inches.
settings.image_alt_mobile: AWOL Vision 4K laser ust projector delivering nearly perfect image clarity on expansive screens, with a cinematic visual.
settings.context:
In both upper corners of the image, the focus and clarity are
close to perfection, you can almost see the pixels appearing
when you get too close.

settings.image_alt: Visualization of the wide color gamut provided by AWOL Vision 4K Laser Projector, outperforming traditional LCD and single laser systems.
settings.image_alt_mobile: AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro projector displays a vivid color range with 107% REC.2020, demonstrating its advanced triple laser technology for true-to-life visuals.
settings.context:
The color palette and behavior is handled flawlessly
whether it’s for SDR or HDR content.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro projector provides an amazing 3D  experience, showing a woman filming underwater.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Experience an amazing underwater TV show with the AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro projector, showcasing Dolby Vision makes a standout performance.
settings.context:
With Dolby Vision, AWOL is the only RGB UST
projector in the market that offers Dolby Vision,
HDR 10+, Dolby Atmos, and Active 3D, It stands
out as the most comprehensive ultra-short throw
RGB laser projector available.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision LTV-3500 Pro provides an immersive 3D movie experience, surpassing IMAX 3D with vivid underwater dolphin imagery.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Experience stunning 3D performance with the AWOL Vision LTV-3500 Pro projector, showcasing dolphins in a crystal-clear underwater scene.
settings.context:
Better than IMAX 3D, you will experience
an immersive “journey” with a movie.

settings.image_alt: LTV-3000 Pro provides a stunning 3D real-time gaming experience, showing IMAX 3D with vivid car game imagery.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Gamers who use AWOL Vision can enjoy the lowest-ever large screen time lag, providing the best real-time gaming experience.
settings.context:
Exhibits the lowest-ever large screen time lag of 8ms
to ensure that all your gaming action is real-time.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision movie mode can deliver the original 24fps to the screen without adding extra frames, totally the director conveys.
settings.image_alt_mobile: AWOL Vision LTV-3000 offers cinema purists professional 24fps native motion and MEMC smooth motion for selected.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision LTV-300 Pro playing polar bear documentary video, delivers a cinema quality sound experience.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Watching the polar bear video with AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro, employed advanced height technology on the traditional stereo, offering user cinema quality sound.
settings.context:
By employing advanced height virtualization techniques
on top of traditional stereo, AWOL deliver an Immersion
audio experience.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision 4K projector's new laser dimming technology delivers enhanced black levels and contrast, demonstrated with before and after flamingo images.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Watching animal documentary videos with AWOL Vision LTV-3000 Pro projector can greatly enhance contrast.
settings.context:
The implementation of Laser dimming technology has
greatly improved contrast, leading to a significant
enhancement in image quality.

settings.image_alt: Cinematic ALR Screen overcoming ceiling light with micro-cirriform optical structure for UST projectors.
settings.image_alt_mobile: Cinematic ALR Screen showcasing 95% ceiling light rejection for ultra short throw projectors.
settings.context:
Our Ceiling-Light Rejecting material absorbs 95% of
overhead lighting. A micro-cirriform optical structure
on the surface filters out ceiling light for superior
picture quality.

settings.image_alt: A comparison showing the 80% image quality improvement of AWOL Vision Cinematic ALR Screen using HBSP material.
settings.image_alt_mobile: AWOL Vision Cinematic ALR Screen with HBSP material showing an 80% improvement in image quality compared to others.
settings.context:
AWOL Vision's cinematic ALR screen uses the
latest optimized lenticular material (HBSP) based
on CBSP material for higher contrast, achieving
an extra 20% gain increase than the regular CBSP
ALR screens on the market.

settings.image_alt: Comparison showing 0.6 dB peak gain of AWOL Vision Cinematic ALR Screen vs matte white screen.
settings.image_alt_mobile: AWOL Vision Cinematic ALR Screen demonstrating 0.6 dB peak gain against ambient light.
settings.context:
Unlike a typical matte white screen, which scatters
light in all directions, the AWOL Vision ALR screen
features a 0.6 dB peak gain. This makes it perfect
for Ultra Short Throw (UST) projection, eliminating
hot spots and effectively countering ambient light.

settings.image_alt: AWOL Vision Cinematic ALR Screen featuring 170° wide viewing angle for bright and clear images.
settings.image_alt_mobile: AWOL Vision Cinematic ALR Screen offering immersive viewing experience with 170° ultra-wide angle.
settings.context:
With a 170° ultra-wide viewing angle, you can enjoy
bright, vivid, and clear images of your favorite movies
, football games or TV shows no matter where you are
in the room.
